description: This file defines a Qwik component for generating and displaying animated flowers, including state management, styles scoped to the component, and dynamic rendering based on user input.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Defines a Qwik component that manages animation and rendering of flowers with interactive controls.

methods.name: useVisibleTask$
methods.description: Sets up side effects that run when the component becomes visible, managing timers for animation.

methods.name: useStore
methods.description: Creates local reactive state for managing flower count and number of flowers.

methods.name: useStylesScoped$
methods.description: Applies scoped CSS styles to the component.
